definition: to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching

sentences.english: In theory, ke- rose can be reduced to obtain a couple of sugar alcohols which are epimers and have the same molecular weight.
sentences.chinese: 酮糖被还原时理论上生成一对等量的差向异构体糖醇。

sentences.english: Isomers are defined as compounds having the same formula but different structures.
sentences.chinese: 异构体被定义为化学式相同而结构不同的化合物。

sentences.english: What is heterogeneous batching and how can it help performance?
sentences.chinese: 何为异构批处理且它如何有助于性能提升？

sentences.english: Which, as a side-effect, makes heterogeneity a non-issue.
sentences.chinese: 所以，作为副作用，异构也不再是一个问题了。

sentences.english: The carbon atomic charge(Qc) on C-O bond described the structural differences among the isomers of aliphatic alcohols and was easy to obtain .
sentences.chinese: 容易获取，表征了醇分子同分异构体之间的结构差异。

sentences.english: The spectral patterns can be used to characterize the above stereoisomers.
sentences.chinese: 其谱态可作为上述立体异构体的结构区分特征。

sentences.english: However, there are still other heterogeneity problems left unresolved.
sentences.chinese: 但是，还有其他一些异构问题尚未解决。

sentences.english: Topology discovery of extra-large networks need go through many heterogeneous networks and management domains.
sentences.chinese: 特大型网络拓扑发现需跨越很多异构型网络及管理域。

sentences.english: The studies in the catalysts for dehydroisomerization of n-butane are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了正丁烷一步脱氢异构催化剂的研究现状。

sentences.english: like an isomerization inside a crystalline solid.
The non-noble metal catalyst for n-pentane isomerization at low temperature was prepared by acid modification.
sentences.chinese: 通过酸性改性制备正戊烷异构化低温非贵金属催化剂。

sentences.english: Allene is an isomer of methyl acetylene.
sentences.chinese: 甲基乙炔的一种异构体。

sentences.english: This toxin is a class of monocyclic heptapeptides with many different isomerides.
sentences.chinese: 该毒素是一类具有多种异构体的环状多肽物质。

sentences.english: Solvent took a significant effect on proportion between isomers of di-nitrated TPP.
sentences.chinese: 溶剂对二硝基TPP两个异构体的比例有较大影响。

sentences.english: Special considerations necessary for stereochemical impurity investigations are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 特别对于光学异构体相关物质的研究也进行了讨论。

definition: side chain (used in classifying amino acids)
